name: NCAA Football
overview: NCAA FOOTBALL puts you right in the thick of it. This game plays like your team plays! Now you can play your favorite teams in the fantasy NCAA Championship. 40 top Division 1-A gridiron powerhouses - with real team colors and logos. This is REAL NCAA Football. Pit the greatest teams of the 60s, 70s, 80s, and 90s against each other in an all-out fight to be number ONE! Over 60 plays including all-time college favorites like the Wishbone and Suicide Blitz! State-of-the-art digitized sound effects, pulse-pounding music and battery back-up features! Intuitive controls make NCAA Football the game any fan can play. Choose quarter length, weather conditions, instant replay and more!
